question: Aditya Mehta, who was seen in news recently, is associated with sports?
explanation:
Indian cueist Aditya Mehta was seen in news recently as he won the National Snooker Championship, held at Pune. He represented the Petroleum Sports Promotion Board (PSPB) and defeated the 22-time-world champion Pankaj Advani 6-2 to win the title. Pankaj recently won the National Billiards Championship.
Vidya Pillai of Karnataka clinched the womenâ€™s snooker title, by beating Amee Kamani of Madhya Pradesh.
